name: Pixel-Breaker
description:
- This is a simple Brick Breaker like puzzle game with a retro art style reminiscent of the Nintendo Game Boy. 

- All art assets were created by me in Krita.

- All sound effects for this game were made by me in Bsfxr.

- The two fonts used in this game are: Rainy Hearts and Press Start 2P.

- I was inspired to make this game by the Complete C# Unity Developer 2d course on Udemy

- This game was created in the Unity 2d game engine.
